data.eml:eml: New species of Aleurodamaeus Grandjean, 1954 (Oribatida: Aleurodamaeidae) from South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hugo-Coetzee, Elizabeth A. (2013): New species of Aleurodamaeus Grandjean, 1954 (Oribatida: Aleurodamaeidae) from South Africa. Zootaxa 3670 (4): 531-556, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.4.7
